content: 4 sts have been increased row 3 rs knit to marker knit raglan stitch work the stitches into lace pattern left sleeve knit raglan stitch knit to beginning of the round to the tail of yarn knit to marker m1r knit raglan stitch m1l work the stitches lace pattern right sleeve m1r knit raglan stitch m1l knit to the gap pick up the stitch with the bobby pin from behind place it on the left needle and knit the next two stitches together k1 place bobby pin turn 4 sts have been increased row 4 ws purl to beginning of the round to the tail of yarn while following the lace pattern on the sleeve purl to marker m1r purl raglan stitch m1l page 3 of 7 follow the lace pattern on the sleeve m1r purl raglan stitch m1l left sleeve purl to the gap slip the next stitch from the left needle to the right needle place stitch from the bobby pin on the left needle slip back the stitch from the right needle and purl these two stitches together p1 replace the bobby pin and turn 4 sts have been increased row 5 rs repeat row 3 4 sts have been increased row 6 ws repeat row 4 4 sts have been increased row 7 rs repeat row 3 4 sts have been increased row 8 ws repeat row 4 4 sts have been increased row 9 rs knit to marker knit raglan stitch follow the lace pattern on the sleeve left sleeve knit raglan stitch knit to beginning of the round to the tail of yarn knit to marker m1r knit raglan stitch m1l follow the lace pattern on the sleeve right sleeve m1r knit raglan stitch m1l knit to the gap pick up the stitch with the bobby pin from behind place it on the left needle and knit the next two stitches together drop bobby pin continue to knit to 1stitch before the next gap using a crochet-hook poke through the stitch before the gap and the bobby pin stitch from behind at the same time see video instructions on hunglish knitter youtube channel with the hook knit these two together and place the stitch on the right needle knit to marker m1r knit raglan stitch m1l follow the lace pattern on the sleeve left sleeve m1r knit raglan stitch m1l knit to beginning of the round to the tail of yarn 8 sts have been increased the shaping of the neckline with short row has been completed there is now a total of 140 144 148 152 160 sts on the needle distribution of sts 22 23 24 24 26 sts right back 1 raglan sts 24 24 24 26 26 sts right sleeve 1 raglan sts 44 46 48 48 52 sts front 1 raglan sts 24 24 24 26 26 sts left sleeve 1 raglan sts 22 23 24 24 26 sts left back page 4 of 7 raglan increases on the
